name: Franistan APT Intrusion Set
description: This intrusion set is highly sophisticated and stealthy, and is allegedly bankrolled by the mysterious forces of Franistan.

name: DDoS Attack
description: A distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attack is a malicious attempt to disrupt normal traffic of a targeted server, service or network by overwhelming the target or its surrounding infrastructure with a flood of Internet traffic.

name: Inject Disinformation
description: Injecting disinformation is a tactic used to spread false or misleading information in order to deceive or manipulate a target.
